name: Encephaloexcavation
description:
Go mining through your procedurally-generated brain.

Encephaloexcavation is a roguelike game. There are a lot of wacky creatures in this procedurally generated world to exterminate, and if you go deep enough, you may just find a mysterious room.

Controls

  • W/Up Arrow/Space - Jump
  • A/Left Arrow - Move Left
  • D/Right Arrow - Move Right
  • R - Reload
  • Left Mouse Button - Mine
  • Right Mouse Button - Fire
  • Use the mouse to aim.

Version History

  • 1.1.1(April 29, 2021) - Bug and Spelling Fixes
  • 1.1.0 (April 27, 2021) - Balancing & Bugfixes
  • 1.0.0 (April 26, 2021) - Initial release for Ludum Dare 48
